    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public AbstractPhoneBill parse()
        We are reading the file name and return the object of phonebill. We are doing a lot of checking in here, such as the checking name, checking file, checking date, and checking phone. We are also storing line by line into the string of array and split it by a comma that is contain in the file. With that comma in the file its easier to split them and store them in the array list.
        Specified by:
        parse in interface PhoneBillParser
        Returns:
        It returns the object of phonebill after it finish reading the text file

      • getFile

        public void getFile​(String fileName,
                    String customerName)
        This function is to store the file name and customer name into this constructor so that we can check if file exist and if the customer name matches from command line and from the file
        Parameters:
        fileName - string that stores the file name from the command line
        customerName - string that stores the customer's name from the command line

      • checkFile

        public boolean checkFile()
        we want to check if the file path exist or not. if it exist we return true if not false so we can decide if we need to create a file for it or not.
        Returns:
        If file exist return true else return false

      • createFile

        public void createFile​(String fileName)
        We want to create a new file if the file path that the user entered doesn't exist. I am making it so that the path is already correct and I just create a new file namd with what was input in the first place
        Parameters:
        fileName - The file name/path that is entered in the command line

      • checkFileName

        public void checkFileName​(String fileCustomerName)
        check the file name and the name that is entered from the command line is the same, if its not the same we want to return an error
        Parameters:
        fileCustomerName - The file customer's name to check with the customer's name that is input from command line
